author: dberlin
msg: Our mergeinfo API is not NULL tolerant, so if a conversion function
caused an error, don't just pass null to the underlying wrapped function.
fail instead of passing NULL along.

author: djh
msg: Allow BDB support to be optional on Win32.
Don't run bdb tests if we're testing fsfs.
(get_install_targets): Drop bdb targets if we don't have bdb.
(get_win_defines): Set define to link fs_base if we have bdb.
(get_win_libs): Don't assume we have a path to bdb.
(_find_bdb): Don't assume they have bdb if it wasn't found.

author: pburba
msg: Tweak svn_wc_text_modified_p's doc string to mention text-time repair behavior.

author: nori
msg: Make a method name more Rubyish in the SWIG/Ruby bindings.
